adjectives.description: unsocial (comparative more unsocial, superlative most unsocial)

entries.meaning: Not seeking or showing the desire for the company of others; inhospitable.
examples: The cupbearer shrugged up his shoulders in displeasure. "I thought to have lodged him in the solere chamber," said he; "but since he is so unsocial to Christians, e'en let him take the next stall to Isaac the Jew's. […]
